subject: Fishing, Sport
Fish and Other Marine Life
lead_paragraph: Perch are a child’s midsummer dream. Give a boy a fishing rod and a cup of bait, and in waters crowded with perch, the perch will do most of the rest.
snippet: Perch are a child’s midsummer dream. Give a boy a fishing rod and a cup of bait, and in waters crowded with perch, the perch will do most of the rest.
